abstract: Interview with artists Dan Colen, Hanna Liden and Nate Lowman, onetime associates of artist Dash Snow and organizers of exhibit Dash Snow: Freeze Means Run at Brant Foundation Art Study Center in Greenwich, Conn; Snow, who died at age 27 in 2009, has come to be associated with drug-fueled excess and adolescent rebellion that arose just before 9/11.
lead_paragraph: The artists Dan Colen, Hanna Liden and Nate Lowman, and Blair Hansen, director of the Dash Snow Archive, discuss the subject of “Dash Snow: Freeze Means Run.”

headline.main: Recalling the Outlaw Eye of Dash Snow

snippet: The artists Dan Colen, Hanna Liden and Nate Lowman, and Blair Hansen, director of the Dash Snow Archive, discuss the subject of “Dash Snow: Freeze Means Run.”
